name: com.unity.vfx-toolbox
description:
Additional Tools for VFX Artists.

* Image Sequencer
* Houdini Exporters for Visual Effect Graph

samples.description: Additional Assets for sampling VertexAnimationTextures. Use the VAT ROP houdini exporter in the package's DCC-Tools~ directory to generate textures from houdini. These samples use ShaderGraph, Visual Effect Graph and High Definition Render Pipeline to render.
